original_text: Already you have all you want! Already you have become rich! You have begun to reign—and that without us! How I wish that you really had begun to reign so that we also might reign with you!
korean_text: 너희가 이미 배 부르며 이미 풍성하며 우리 없이도 왕이 되었도다 우리가 너희와 함께 왕 노릇 하기 위하여 참으로 너희가 왕이 되기를 원하노라

sentences.original_text: Already you have all you want!
sentences.korean_translation: 이미 너희는 원하는 모든 것을 가졌구나!

sentences.original_text: How I wish that you really had begun to reign
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 정말로 통치하기 시작했다면 얼마나 좋을까

sentences.original_text: so that we also might reign with you!
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 우리도 너희와 함께 통치할 수 있게!
